mapper.sql: userId, createdBy, createdDate, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdatedBy, version, age, dateOfBirth, description, `domain`, email, enabled, expireDate, gender, hostName, ip, loginDateTime, mobile, `password`, remark, `status`, userAccount, username
userId, version, age, dateOfBirth, description, `domain`, email, enabled, expireDate, gender, hostName, ip, loginDateTime, mobile, `password`, remark, `status`, userAccount, username
mapper.select: select u.userId, r.roleId, p.permissionsId, p.permissionCode, u.username, p.action, r.roleCode, u.description, u.userAccount from role_permissions rp, permissions p, roles r, user_roles ur, users u where 1 = 1 and rp.permissionsId = p.permissionsId and rp.roleId = r.roleId and ur.roleId = r.roleId and ur.userId = u.userId and u.userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by userId

select u.userId, r.roleId, p.permissionsId, p.permissionCode, u.username, p.action, r.roleCode, u.description, u.userAccount from role_permissions rp, permissions p, roles r, user_roles ur, users u where 1 = 1 and rp.permissionsId = p.permissionsId and rp.roleId = r.roleId and ur.roleId = r.roleId and ur.userId = u.userId order by userId
mapper.insert: insert into users (createdBy, createdDate, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdatedBy, version, age, dateOfBirth, description, `domain`, email, enabled, expireDate, gender, hostName, ip, loginDateTime, mobile, `password`, remark, `status`, userAccount, username) values (#{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into users
createdBy,
createdDate,
lastUpdateDate,
lastUpdatedBy,
version,
age,
dateOfBirth,
description,
`domain`,
email,
enabled,
expireDate,
gender,
hostName,
ip,
loginDateTime,
mobile,
`password`,
remark,
`status`,
userAccount,
username,

mapper.update:
update users
createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdDate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastUpdatedBy = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dateOfBirth = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`domain` = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
expireDate = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginDateTime = #{loginDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userAccount = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update users set createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdDate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUpdatedBy = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dateOfBirth = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `domain` = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, expireDate = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hostName = #{hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginDateTime = #{loginDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userAccount = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
